snippet: Despite facing criticism for starting Black Friday sales at midnight last year, some retailers are planning to open on the evening of Thanksgiving Day.
abstract: Some retailers are planning to open for shoppers in the early evening hours of Thanksgiving Day, despite facing criticism for the early start to Black Friday; workers and shoppers say holiday should be reserved for family, not lining up for the start of the Christmas shopping season.
lead_paragraph: Despite facing criticism for starting Black Friday sales at midnight last year, some retailers are planning to open on the evening of Thanksgiving Day.

headline.seo: Black Friday Deals Will Start Earlier This Year
headline.main: Make Room for Deals After Turkey This Year
headline.print_headline: Make Room For Deals After Turkey This Year
